rev.diff:
Line 41: Line 41:
* '''Improved Celebrations (PS3, Xbox 360)''': Celebrations will now use the in-game camera rather than separate cutscenes. It is also confirmed that teammates can now join in celebrations. Also, only more skilled or acrobatic players can perform the more acrobatic celebrations, such as a back flip. ''FIFA 11'' also includes players' signature celebrations, which they can perform with a simple push of a button. For example, if the player scores with Tim Cahill, the player will box the corner flag, and if a player scores with [[Miroslav Klose]] he will do a front flip. <ref name="BackPage">[http://www.ea.com/uk/news/the-backpage-fifa-11-update?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=news&utm_content=Twitter Fifa 11 Update], The Backpage</ref>
* '''Improved Celebrations (PS3, Xbox 360)''': Celebrations will now use the in-game camera rather than separate cutscenes. It is also confirmed that teammates can now join in celebrations. Also, only more skilled or acrobatic players can perform the more acrobatic celebrations, such as a back flip. ''FIFA 11'' also includes players' signature celebrations, which they can perform with a simple push of a button. For example, if the player scores with Tim Cahill, the player will box the corner flag, and if a player scores with [[Miroslav Klose]] he will do a front flip. <ref name="BackPage">[http://www.ea.com/uk/news/the-backpage-fifa-11-update?utm_source=twitter&utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=news&utm_content=Twitter Fifa 11 Update], The Backpage</ref>

pes 2011 is better than fifa 2011 so please do not buy fifa 2011
+
== Covers ==
  +
Each regional version of ''FIFA 11'' features different players on the cover. [[KakÃ¡]] will be featured on the cover globally.<ref>http://kotaku.com/5605780/kaka-is-fifa-11s-worldwide-cover-athlete</ref> The [[United Kingdom]] and [[Republic of Ireland|Ireland]] covers feature [[KakÃ¡]] and [[Wayne Rooney]]; the [[Australia]]n cover features [[KakÃ¡]], [[Wayne Rooney]], and [[Tim Cahill]];<ref>http://www.kotaku.com.au/2010/08/fifa-11-box-art-puts-tim-cahill-at-centre-forward/</ref> the [[North America]]n version features [[KakÃ¡]], [[Carlos Vela]], and [[Landon Donovan]].
